hooks.command: if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"rm -rf"* ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Dangerous command - rm -rf detected' && exit 2; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"git push --force"* ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Dangerous command - force push detected' && exit 2; fi

if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"supabase start"* ]] || [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"db reset"* ]] || [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"db pull"* ]]; then echo 'BLOCKED: Supabase local commands not allowed' && exit 2; fi
if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" =~ \.test\.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then pnpm test "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
